what:
Coerce YYYYMMDD columns in a data frame to dates where possible, using
lubridate::ymd. This function only converts columns where every value
successfully coerces to a date. — coerce_dates

what: Extract a feature table using a feature JSON file. — featurise

text: Extract feature table using feature JSON file.

title: Extract a feature table using a feature JSON file. — featurise
Extract a feature table using a feature JSON file. — featurise
text: all_tables List input tables (passed read_all_tables). feature_json_file Path feature JSON file. context character vector used logging error messages. Defaults NULL.

title: Extract a feature table using a feature JSON file. — featurise
text: list following elements: feature_table: data frame one row per patient ID one column containing sum matching rows source table. column names 'id' ID (standardised across feature tables), value output_column_name. missing_value: value use patients matching rows source table. value passed downstream function joins feature tables together.

Defaults NULL.

what:
First passes a table through a filter, then counts the time between a given
date and the first OR last date in the filtered table. — featurise_time_since
title:
First passes a table through a filter, then counts the time between a given
date and the first OR last date in the filtered table. — featurise_time_since
text: First passes table filter, counts time given date first last date filtered table.

title:
First passes a table through a filter, then counts the time between a given
date and the first OR last date in the filtered table. — featurise_time_since

First passes a table through a filter, then counts the time between a given
date and the first OR last date in the filtered table. — featurise_time_since
text: all_tables List input tables (passed read_all_tables). spec list containing following elements: source_file:         Filename source table read . primary_filter:      filter object apply source table. date_column:         Name date column source table calculate time since. cutoff_date:         date calculate time since . from_first:          TRUE, calculate time since first date filtered table. FALSE, calculate time since last (recent) date filtered table. time_units:          Either "days" "years". number years defined number full 365.25 day periods two dates (rounded nearest whole number). output_feature_name: Name output column. grouping_columns:    Name columns source table group . absent_data_flag:    value use patients matching rows source table. context character vector used logging error messages. Defaults NULL.

title:
First passes a table through a filter, then counts the time between a given

text: list following elements: feature_table: data frame one row per patient ID one column containing count matching rows source table. column names 'id' ID (standardised across feature tables), value output_column_name. missing_value: value use patients matching rows source table. value passed downstream function joins feature tables together.
